title: Is there somewhere for indie artists to submit their lyrics other than Gracenote? - Quora

response.answer_text: I just created a site that - allows song writers to submit their song lyrics- suggest artist(s) to sing their song- get votes (in the hopes that if number of votes soar, it'll attract well-known artist(s) and possibly have them perform/sing your songs).If you submit songs, try sharing link to your song with friends so they can upvote your song (if they like it).The site is brand new (it was born on Nov 10, 2014).It's located at http://artistsingmysong.comxa.com/
Not sure why you would want to do that when sites like Page on musixmatch.com exist. In general, if your music has any measure of popularity it will already be freely available on websites.
